item.title: Instalasi Laravel 10, PHP 8.1 dan MariaDB pada webserver Apache2 di Debian 11
item.author: Larry Marzan Jr.
item.description: Requirements for Laravel 10, php8.1 and MariaDB running on Apache2 Server from Debian 11: Install Apache2 Server: 1 2 sudo apt update sudo apt install apache2 Install & configure php8.1: 1 sudo apt install -y lsb-release ca-certificates curl php8.1-cli php8.1-common php8.1-mysql php8.1-zip php8.1-gd php8.1-mbstring php8.1-curl php8.1-xml php8.1-bcmath enable PHP extensions 1 sudo nvim /etc/php/8.1/apache2/php.ini Uncomment the following options to enable PHP extensions fileinfo, openssl, and mbstring.
